content.title: Conversation
table: Patient: I have a stomach ache.
Doctor: Is it something you ate?
Doctor: What did you have for breakfast?
Patient: Egg with milk and a banana.
بیمار: تخم مرغ با شیر و موز.
Doctor: Maybe the milk was spoiled.
دکتر: ممکن است شیر خراب بوده باشد.
Doctor: I will give you an injection to dull the pain.
دکتر: من یک آمپول به شما می‌زنم تا دردتان کم شود.

content.title: Common Phrases
table: I would like to see a doctor.
I would like to make an appointment.
من به مشاوره پزشکی نیاز دارم.

content.title: Reading
content.description: Ibn Sina was born in 980 AD in Bukhara. He was an Iranian physician and poet. Ibn Sina has written many books on the topic of medicine. Mr. George Sarten considers Ibn Sina to be the greatest scientists in the field of medicine. Ibn Sina has written his books in the Arabic language because in his time, Arabic was a common language.
